name: Super Lucky Puncher
description:
Protagonist is too lucky, his luck has increased 1000000 times!
Now he dodges from all the attacks and all his strikes are always critical and deadly! And here it is, wolves attacking with knives, annoying bats, bears fighters and other enemies. Let's see where it will lead him in the end.

Made with GameMaker 8, upgraded to GameMaker: Studio.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD-movements, J-strike, K-jump, L-super, Space/Enter-start, Esc-menu
If you like, you can use Arrows and Z, X, C.
Also Gamepad Xbox360 Controller is supported
F4 - window/fullscreen, F9 - take screenshot

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Characters:

There are 5 characters in the game, 3 from the start and 2 are unlockables for completing a game. Actually this is the same one character, it is just his alter egoes from other realms.
Every character has its own stats and movelist.

Stats:
Destruction - ability to annihilate hordes of enemies as much as you can, and as fast as you can.
Mobility - ability to go wherever you want, double jumps, charges, and other moves.
Energy - ability to gain energy for super moves faster from attacks and dodges.

Moves:
Basic - moves that don't use energy, like simple punches, uppercuts, double jumps.
Super - moves that use part of energy bar for strong attacks, or special actions.
Ultra - devastating moves that use whole maximum energy bar.

To see movelist just open Escape menu while playing your hero.
